scripts.build:win: set NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 && set NODE_ENV=production && next build
scripts.build:turbo: cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=production DISABLE_TYPESCRIPT=1 NEXT_SKIP_TYPECHECKING=1 NEXT_DISABLE_ESLINT=1 node --max-old-space-size=4096 ./node_modules/.bin/next build --no-lint
scripts.build:sonic: cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=production DISABLE_TYPESCRIPT=1 NEXT_SKIP_TYPECHECKING=1 NEXT_DISABLE_ESLINT=1 NEXT_CACHE_LEVEL=aggressive NEXT_WEBPACK_DISABLE_STRICT_MODE=true NEXT_MINIMAL_BUILD=true NEXT_TURBO=true next build --no-lint
scripts.build:win-fast: set NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 && set NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 && set NODE_ENV=production && set DISABLE_TYPESCRIPT=1 && set NEXT_SKIP_TYPECHECKING=1 && set NEXT_DISABLE_ESLINT=1 && set NEXT_MINIMAL_BUILD=true && next build --no-lint
